job.title: Senior Data Engineer – Remote, Full-time
job.description: design your lifestyle as a top freelance data engineer with the freedom to work however wherever on your termsltbrgtltbrgtfreelance work is defining the careers of todays data engineers in exciting new ways if youre passionate about working flexibly with leading fortune brands and innovative silicon valley startups toptal could be a great fit for your next career shiftltbrgtltbrgttoptal is an elite talent network for the worlds top of developers connecting the best and brightest freelancers with top organizations unlike a to job youll choose your own schedule and work from anywhere jobs come to you so you wont bid for projects against other data engineers in a race to the bottom plus toptal takes care of all the overhead empowering you to focus on successful engagements while getting paid on time at the rate you decide every timeltbrgtltbrgtas a freelance data engineer you could join an everexpanding community of experts in over countries working remotely on the projects that meet your career ambitionsltbrgtltbrgtthats why the worlds top of developers choose toptal data engineers in our elite network shareltbrgtltligt at least years of professional experience in data engineeringltligtltligt project management skillsltligtltligt a keen attention to detailltligtltligt experience with cloud technologies aws azure is a strong advantageltligtltligt professional experience with business intelligence and data engineering is requiredltligtltligt fulltime availability is a strong advantageltbrgtltbrgtltligtif youre ready for a career shift to impactful freelance work take the next step by clicking apply and filling out the short formltbrgtremotejobsdataengineeringltbrgtltbrgt
